chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title [see Note 1]
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Former Complying Superannuation Funds) Act 1994 > Section 1
chunks.text:
This Act may be cited as the Income Tax (Former Complying
         Superannuation Funds) Act 1994.

chunks.title: Section 2 - Commencement [see Note 1]
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Former Complying Superannuation Funds) Act 1994 > Section 2
chunks.text:
This Act commences on the day on which it receives the Royal
         Assent.

chunks.title: Section 3 - Imposition of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Former Complying Superannuation Funds) Act 1994 > Section 3
chunks.text:
Income tax is imposed on the taxable income of a non-complying
         superannuation fund within the meaning of the Income Tax Assessment
         Act 1997, to the extent that the taxable income is attributable to
         the inclusion of an amount in the fundâs assessable income under
         table item 2 in sectionÂ 295-320 of that Act.
